name: belay
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to control a rope that a climber is attached to and keep it tight, so that if the climber falls, they do not fall very far: The leader will then belay and instruct the second climber to follow.
[ T ] to make a climber safe with a rope that has been fixed at a particular point: The knot would let Jim belay himself.
